TITLE: Including FlyonUI as a Tailwind CSS Plugin
DESCRIPTION: CSS configuration showing how to include FlyonUI as a plugin in your app.css file. This snippet demonstrates both standard inclusion and gitignored node_modules approaches, along with options for JS components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/themeselection/flyonui/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
@import "tailwindcss";
@plugin "flyonui";
@import "./node_modules/flyonui/variants.css"; // Require only if you want to use FlyonUI JS component

// If you gitignored node_modules use below method
@source "./node_modules/flyonui/dist/index.js"; // Require only if you want to use FlyonUI JS component
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including FlyonUI JavaScript in HTML
DESCRIPTION: HTML script tag for including FlyonUI's JavaScript file before the closing body tag. This enables the interactive components like accordion, dropdown, and modal functionality.
SOURCE: https://github.com/themeselection/flyonui/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="../node_modules/flyonui/flyonui.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing FlyonUI via NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install FlyonUI as a dependency using NPM. This is the first step in integrating FlyonUI into your project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/themeselection/flyonui/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install flyonui
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Specific FlyonUI Component Script
DESCRIPTION: HTML script tag for including a specific FlyonUI component JavaScript file. This approach allows for more efficient loading by only including the scripts needed for particular components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/themeselection/flyonui/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script src="../node_modules/flyonui/dist/accordion.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Specific FlyonUI JS Component
DESCRIPTION: CSS syntax for importing a specific FlyonUI JavaScript component instead of the entire library. This approach is useful for reducing bundle size by only including required components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/themeselection/flyonui/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: css
CODE:
```
@source "./node_modules/flyonui/dist/accordion.js";
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing FlyonUI via NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install FlyonUI package through NPM package manager
SOURCE: https://github.com/themeselection/flyonui/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install flyonui
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RTL Support Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example of RTL language support setup in FlyonUI
SOURCE: https://github.com/themeselection/flyonui/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<html dir="rtl">
  <!-- Your content here -->
</html>
```
